summary: Provides a CKAN extension that integrates with the platform to translate internal entity identifiers into humanâ€‘readable labels, offering helper objects, group classification logic, and fallback handling for entity type humanization.
business_intent: Enhances the usability and discoverability of CKAN data catalogs by presenting clear, friendly names instead of opaque IDs, thereby simplifying navigation, reporting, and downstream integration for users and administrators.
